website_summaries.verdict: A very portable and easy to set up beach tent.
pros: This model gets top marks for its convenience, as most users reported that is is extremely quick and easy to assemble
It also stands out for being sturdy despite its lightweight design
cons: Quality control could be improved, as it tends to have some issues with the stakes
It also has variable performance in windy conditions

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, quality materials, strong hold in windy environments.
customer_reviews.text: Setup is super easy and quick. Cabana withstood consistent wind gusts of 20mph for 7 straight hours (I had to stake down 2 strings in the side that faced the wind). Great product, worth the money if you are going to use it more then once or twice a year. My only suggestion would be to buy a better set of stakes. The 8 plastic stakes that come with it are not that great. Also, they only give you 8 stakes when 10 can be used if you are going to stake down all sides and front flap.
customer_reviews.author: RP Delco

customer_reviews.title: Top notch in all ways
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beach tent for what it is -- not something for sleeping under the stars in the mountains, not meant to weather heavy rain storms -- but a lightweight, easy to set up and take down tent to keep family members out of the blazing sun, or to allow a quick change of a diaper or a wet swimsuit lakeside or at a beach. (Since it is indeed lightweight, be sure to anchor it properly either with sufficient items like coolers or boom boxes inside or you will watch it blowing out to sea in a moderately heavy wind.) Yes, there could be little minor improvements, but this is an awesome beach tent.
customer_reviews.author: Doc K.

customer_reviews.title: Great tent. Not so great carrying case.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little bit to get the hang of opening and closing the tent, but it sure is useful! Large, comfortable, and perfect for our beach going needs. I found the anchors were strong enough to hold the tent in place. I didn't use the sand bags. The only issue is the strap from the carrying bag ripped the first time we used it. Literally carrying it from the car to the beach and the strap ripped. So that part was unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: T. L.Top Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Great size and air flow, Smart Set up Design
customer_reviews.text: Great size and air flow (it's nice to be able to open the mesh windows) and good stability. Very The only down sides were that it's a little tricky for one person to do if it's really windy (though it's very stable once it's done) and we were missing two stakes for securing the extra lines. But it worked even without it in windy weather. The amount of shade and room inside were perfect. Roomy for two adults and a small child. Could probably fit three adults depending on size.
customer_reviews.author: Margarite

customer_reviews.title: This was as easy to set up as the video shows
customer_reviews.text: The base is a tarp-like material and the cabana is pretty much like a 3-sided tent. My husband made a couple of comments upon closer inspection: 1) lots of moving, interconnected parts for the poles...hope they don't break, or that they last a long time, and 2) the window shades are on the inside of the cabana so if it rains the shades would not keep the rain out. Not to say we will be using the cabana in the rain, but it would be a wiser construction in my opinion to at least have the option of the window shade panels on the exterior.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pannepacker

customer_reviews.title: Good but I was not expecting rust on it
customer_reviews.text: I liked but after ~15 beaches use rust start to appear and I was really not expecting to see that in a beach tent. Pros: - Light to carry - Easy to assemble - Easy to disassemble Areas for enhancement: - Use another material that doesn't rust - The way to seal the tiny windows could be better, on the beaches of California with tons of wind is pretty cold inside even with closed windows - I overpaid​ and now observed that the price reduced
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for picnics and the beach.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re an outdoor person, this is the best thing to keep you out of the direct sun and elements like the wind and sand. Especially handy with toddlers and infants. Easy to set up and collapse. Only reason I give it a 4 star is that after collapsing, difficult to put in the bag. Wish the storage bag was just a little roomier. But highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda M Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Defective Fiber Glass Rods
customer_reviews.text: I used this twice. The second time I popped it open, one of the rods snapped in half. Replacement rods are not an option (I asked) and an exchange was not even offered.
customer_reviews.author: K Hendrick

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Love using this for the beach! It is super easy to set up and take down. I can do it by myself but it's helpful to have a second person when putting it away to help keep sand out. We plan to use it when camping too for the kids while playing. The black tarp bottom does get hot like some other reviews mentioned but we just bring an old blanket and lay it over the tarp...problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: SarahSweets

customer_reviews.title: Last version was better. Hard to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.text: This a newer model and it takes two people to push the top two parts together. I am a 5’9”, 45 year old former college athlete and coach still in decent shape, and I need two people to do it. The last model had a string to pull and the top two pieces met together. This one you actually have to press the two pieces together so it is much harder to set up and take down, especially in the wind. The legs all turn different directions, rather just pulling the string attachment and it popping up. It is still a great shelter from the rain, in really cold soccer games it helps keep you warmer and blocks the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVE THIS TENT
customer_reviews.text: We bought this tent to protect our 10 week old from the sun, while at the beach. We quickly found ourselves wishing that we had made this purchase several years ago. It's lightweight and easy to transport, and truly is a quick set up. One person can do it alone, and it's just as easy to take down and pack up. We took this tent on several car trips during the summer and is great to use at the lake or even in your backyard while enjoying a cookout with neighbors. If you are considering buying this tent, quit thinking about it and just get it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and disassemble.
customer_reviews.text: This beach tent was super easy to assemble, and allowed our family to stay longer at the beach with having a good amount of shade for the kiddos to rest in. The tarp gets quite hot both inside and outside the tent, so I found we needed to put towels down to avoid being too hot for little kids. It was super easy to disassemble when it was time to go home.
customer_reviews.author: FanadGirl

customer_reviews.title: A great beach tent!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This beach tent was amazingly easy to set up. Just one click!! Windows allow sea breeze to travel through so it won’t blow away and the stakes were durable. You even get two extras. Great price! Easy instructions and simple to pack away in its handy carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Toby D. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I have ever made.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a long time ago for my wife. We have brought this tent to every beach trip and to every outdoor event. It is now an essential part of our outdoor necessities. I highly recommend this to anyone who needs a quick and easy way to enjoy themselves while they are outside. I have had zero issues with it since day one.
customer_reviews.author: Jerzy

customer_reviews.title: Lightspeed Sunshade
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this sunshade a lot. Pretty easy to set up, the size is big enough for a small family of 3 or 4 peoples. One of the inside pocket was ripe due to faulty stitches. We wanted to send it back for a replacement but the supplier only allows me to return it and purchase it again. That is so inconvenient. Besides the inside pocket was ripe overall we like this sunshade very much.
customer_reviews.author: Fion Hohnstein

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra expense
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different shade tent from Walmart, opened it, saw how difficult it would be to assemble and returned it immediately to purchase this. Price is a little steep but it's so worth it! This takes like 30 seconds to put up and is perfect for our 6 month old. Very spacious, excellent sun cover, fast setup.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli G.

customer_reviews.title: Best for partly sunny days
customer_reviews.text: Well I didn't trust those lil plastic stakes on the beach, so I replaced those before giving them a chance. It handled the wind at the beach just fine. Was very simple for me by myself to assemble. However I would of expected better shade from the sun. At the end of a long nap, I was a lil red and it was quite hot inside
customer_reviews.author: Timmy22

customer_reviews.title: it's easy to repeat
customer_reviews.text: This tent is prefect for taking to the beach. It is not very heavy and it is such a breeze to set up. It was a little difficult the first time to lock the mechanism in place, but once you figure it out, it's easy to repeat. The screened windows are perfect for letting a breeze through and the sand pockets are great for weighing the tent down, so I never need to use the stakes. Depending on the position of the sun, you could even shade 3 people lying down.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Liu

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Heats up like a microwave. Even with the window vents open. The "floor" gets so hot you need shoes to keep feet from blistering. Was seriously disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Twnzmama

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I read lots of reviews before purchasing. This is exactly what I wanted. I bought a folding lounge chair(low to the ground camp chair) and its perfect in here with lots of room for my four young boys. Sets up super fast. Take down is a breeze. Plus it fits in the storage bag with room for my small fleece throw blanket. It's crazy light weight. Lighter than the chair I use in it! *I am not a paid reviewer!* I like to give my feedback when I can, because often times, that's what I have to go on when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: GREAT except the floor
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!! We took this to the Fort Lauderdale Air and Sea show and it was perfect! Quick and easy to set up AND it fit into the VERY small spaces that were available between the hundreds of other viewers with their umbrellas. The only problem with this is the 'floor' is black and get INCREDIBLY HOT!!! NOT KID OR BAREFOOT FRIENDLY!! We covered the floor with towels....but thats just one more thing to pack so keep that in mind!
customer_reviews.author: spring

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was super impressed with the beach tent when it arrived. The tent comes with an outer sleeve for storage and transport (much like a folding chair). The tent is very easy to open and close because all poles are fixed to the tent and articulate to fold out. I was skeptical of the durability, but let me tell you many people have come up and commented about our tent and asked where they can get one. I would recommend investing in a more sturdy set of tent stakes if you are going to be on a beach with any kind of wind. Other than that, this is a great product that I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J Gaver

customer_reviews.title: Lightspeed setup, sturdy beach tent.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Lightspeed Quick Cabana and I couldn't be more pleased with the ease and convenience of this product. First, let me preface this by stating that I am a size 4, female. I can easily set it up and take it down within a couple minutes. All of the tent poles are already in place—you just pull up the top of the tent, secure it and the breakdown is just as simple. As some of the other reviewers have mentioned, the tarp flooring does get HOT within seconds of being in the sun, so take caution and be sure to place a large beach mat or blanket over it.
customer_reviews.author: kensi

customer_reviews.title: Beach ready and tested
customer_reviews.text: Excellent size for price. We were able to pitch it up without the extra supporting stakes and string for 7/8 days on a southern South Carolina beach, one day was very very windy 40mph, so we had to secure all the fastenings down with stakes but it held strong after that. Easy to put away as well. We ended up rolling the front tarp up because, on the sand, it was like lava. Tons of people liked it on the beach as well.
customer_reviews.author: brkbeatjunkie

customer_reviews.title: Beach Comfort - Hassle-free!
customer_reviews.text: Few products make you stop and think, "this was well worth buying", but this product does. After years of fussing with umbrellas in windy conditions, this cabana required no additional attention whatsoever during our 10-hours on the sand! This truly is worry-free home base on the beach. My only regret was stepping down from the larger size. I'd like to be able to put the normal lawn chairs inside to stay shaded. Oh, and if you spend the entire day on the sand like we do - drape a blanket over the cabana for extra sunscreen protection!
customer_reviews.author: John M Carter

customer_reviews.title: but this turned out to be a great product. Easy to set up and take down ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally trust anything with the name Lightspeed, but this turned out to be a great product. Easy to set up and take down and held up great during very windy days. It would be perfect if it came with a can of mace to keep away all the annoying life guards who kept telling me i wasn't allowed to have a tent on the beach,
customer_reviews.author: M. Sedek

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this cabana
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this cabana !! I would give it ten stars if I could. The cabana goes up so quickly and easily, and comes down the same! I love the sand ballasts, as stakes don't work well in sand. They kept our cabana in its place, even in windy weather. It provides a great amount of room inside to easily change our granddaughter, and hold the cooler and several beach bags! Our dogs enjoyed the shade it provides on a hot summer day, and I enjoy the wind buffer as the evening cools down! Love, love love it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Kristan

customer_reviews.title: Great tent very good material
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to return this tent because it wasn’t big enough for my family. But it’s definitely great tent fabric it’s not cheap it’s high quality and you can see it right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Onlysss

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected-barely fits 2 adults.
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I was expecting. Barely fit my husband and I, and we’re just average sized people. Just wish it was bigger and not as cramped so it was more enjoyable to sit under. I feel like if it had been bigger, I’d have been happier with the price. Quality is fine, though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Well-Made, and Effective
customer_reviews.text: This tent has weathered two consecutive years of week-long beach usage with almost no visible wear. It took very little time to get the hang of setting it up and I can usually get it set within 10 minutes or less. I quickly learned that rolling-up the internal window shades makes a big difference with wind. Unless you really need the extra shade, I would recommend rolling up the shades to allow the wind to move through the tent instead of creating a sail effect. All-in-all I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M.H. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great beach tent, strong!
customer_reviews.text: We are in Hawaii and make an effort to get out to the beach at least once a week. we have a infant as well, this shade has been great to keep us in the shade while under the sun. stands up strong to the wind with regular anchors not having to even use the sand bags. we have the trades which on average 15 to 20+. easy set up, even with one hand, one can manage. so far so good, I feel that there is really not that much metal, so not corrode easily as our Coleman did and no zippers which is great, so they don't freeze by the salt air. thanks for great product
customer_reviews.author: O.D.T

customer_reviews.title: Easy, effective, built to last
customer_reviews.text: We live in florida, so this is great. Easy to use, does get a bit sandy so be careful. I can't even open my stroller by myself half the time, but could open and close this by myself. It helps as a sun shelter, great place to store your cooler, and if you put q vlean beach towel down when you plan to chill in it for a while then you don't need to worry about the sand that gets tracked in. Exposed floor can get hot in sun, so be careful of that. But i was really pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a beach trip
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a beach trip with our 1 year old. He loved sitting in it for breaks and it was a perfect snack location. We aren't all day beach people so this was perfect to pop up and quickly take down when we were ready to go in for nap time.
customer_reviews.author: C. H.

customer_reviews.title: Best beach purchase you could make!!
customer_reviews.text: Best sun shade I have ever used. If you have ever had your umbrella blow away at the beach, you will appreciate this sun shade. It is so easy to put up by yourself. It only takes minutes to set up and put away. Every time I go to the beach someone stops and asks me about it and where I bought it. One of the best purchases I have ever made. I've had it for years and it still works great. Keeps you protected from the sun when you need a break from the heat.
customer_reviews.author: ria lynn

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up beach shelter
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a quick and easy shelter that could give us a break from the sun on beach days and this is the perfect option. Sets up in seconds and comes down just as easy. Plenty of room inside for a couple beach chairs, cooler and other items.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl & Beth  Vanover

customer_reviews.title: A must for beach and baby!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a weekend trip to Rehoboth beach DE with the wife and our 15 month old baby. It is awesome. It pops open easily and snaps into place without much effort. It stayed in place with the included plastic stakes even with a bit of a gusty beach breeze. It closes and folds with medium effort. I'd recommend practicing once at home, which I did, so when it came time to leave I looked like a pro instead if a goof. Baby loved it, it's roomy inside and she ran around it and into the walls with giggles. The mat extension did get hot in the sun so we put blankets down, besides that, top quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Albizu

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up and take down after about 4 trips to the beach. It does tend to blow around in heavy wind, and I've had to pack it up once or twice as the front poles were bending the wrong way. The bottom is easy to clean and shake out when it gets sandy. This tent packed up is longer than I expected but very light.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Has significantly upgraded our beach experience
customer_reviews.text: We life near the coast in Northern California and love taking our dogs to various beaches in this area. We've envied other people at the beach who have a shady comfortable seating that isn't blown over in the breeze, is lightweight, and can be set up or packed up in less than five minutes. Well, this item does the trick. We have taken it with us on several such beach days and it has improved our experience immeasurably.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Schenk

customer_reviews.title: Easy use but hard to block early sun
customer_reviews.text: This tent does what it says. Lightweight and easy set up and take down. The problem for me is that we wanted to use on the beach but until after noon it won’t block any sun because of its shape. We had to face it away from the water and then turn it as the sun moved. It’s not the fault of the tent but didn’t fit for this use.
customer_reviews.author: Josh5454

customer_reviews.title: Love this beach tent.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in 2015. We have used it extensively at the beach, lake and parks. Easy to set up and take down. We use this so much that the bag fell apart. Excellent customer service and they shipped us a new bag. Would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Korena L Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Although, I have not used this for a long time now, I love this little cabana. It is super easy to set up and when the wind starts blowing all of a sudden on the beach, I don't have to run after it like those running after their umbrellas. I live in Florida, so for those outside of Florida just going to the beach once in a while, this might be pricey. But for those going to the beach regularly, this is perfect. Most of those beach umbrellas can last you a season or two at most. That is if there is no serious wind. They are made of cheap plastic. I've had cheap and expensive. They all suck.
customer_reviews.author: Zuzkin

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the beach & superb customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this recently on a hot & windy day at the beach. This cabana protected our family of 3 (2 adults + 1 toddler) from the elements and we were able to spend 5 hours comfortably through the early afternoon hot weather and then the chilly winds in the evening. Setup and take down was literally 10 seconds tops! There was a minor issue with a missing accessory which was taken care of very quickly by Amazon and Lightspeed customer service. Can't say enough good things about the helpfulness and professionalism of both these companies. Top notch service and product!!
customer_reviews.author: The Two Hsus

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Really easy and fast to put up. We have had this for 3 years. It's somewhat lightweight but somewhat long to fit into our trunk so we have to really position it just right with our other stuff when traveling. If we had a minivan it might fit better.
customer_reviews.author: David Honkomp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Beach
customer_reviews.text: Brought it out to the local beach and everyone in my party loved it. It provided a nice amount of shade for anyone that wanted it with super easy setup. The footprint was so big too. Can't wait to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hamano

customer_reviews.title: Quick Set up
customer_reviews.text: HUGE is the best way to describe this thing!! When it is closed up and in its bag it is easily carried by any adult....But when open it is huge! This will easily hold 4 adults. It was purchases for myself and my husband and there is plenty of room for us plus loads of bags. It has 3 windows that you can open up or there are privacy flaps. On each side there is a small bag to hold sand to keep it from blowing away. The Cabana also comes with a bag of stakes in case you are not using it at the beach. Not cheaply made! We were very impressed!! Great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Dean and Ronny

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Goes up easy, goes down easy, no problem getting it back in the bag. Nice cross breeze when the windows were open, and protected my sensitive-to-sun skin. Everything I wanted! The front flap was a little annoying, since we used the tent on the beach and had no need for extra tarp in front of us, but I just kept it folded inside and will consider it a bonus if we ever need it in a grassy situation. Didn't need to use the stakes, having two chairs a beach bag and a cooler inside kept it from flying away.
customer_reviews.author: lisa tallevi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and easy to take down
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and easy to take down. It held up great at the beach (Orange Beach & Gulf Shores, Alabama) even in wind without sand just using stakes. It doesn't wrinkle easily so it's not the most aesthetically pleasing. Also, as others have mentioned, the piece that extends out from the tent does get EXTREMELY hot. It's easily remedied with beach towels etc but it is worth noting since kids will not think about it before climbing in.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the baby to keep out of sun
customer_reviews.text: Did not open as shown. Had to turn it sideways and push the brace up. May have recieved a faulty one. Perfect for the baby to keep out of sun. Lightweight & easy to pick up & turn as the sun moves. Came in handy for an injured soccer player to stay out of sun for a while. After folding up, rolling it tight to fit in bag is not the best if you are alone with infant, stroller, etc. I just rolled it up and put the elastic the largest it would go and wrapped it around to keep the tent from opening in the car.
customer_reviews.author: gram

customer_reviews.title: It is very light to carry over your shoulder.
customer_reviews.text: Used at the beach several times. We watched many people with tent-type things at the beach and they were all very difficult with putting together poles and such. This just literally POPS right up and folds down great. There's even a little room in the bag so if you don't fold it up really tight it still goes right in.
customer_reviews.author: nancy hayford

customer_reviews.title: This has already paid for itself.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9 month old daughter, this takes 30 seconds to put up in our yard. I can't imagine not having this. For the beach this is perfect. If you're a stickler for putting it in "it's nylon bag" and tucking it away in your car, you might be frustrated. If you're like me, and have no problem folding something into a 3 sq. ft. to go package that you'll throw in the trunk of the car or shed at home, you'll be fine. 3 windows that give you great airflow. Bring a blanket to put down on the bottom in the heat, a chair or 2 for mom and dad, and you're set!
customer_reviews.author: O'DonnellsinSD

customer_reviews.title: Block some sun
customer_reviews.text: This beach tent was easy to set-up and take down. I did it by myself but with help (even a child) it's a lot easier and you can reduce the chance of damage. The bags used to hold down the tent worked great even with some wind and we did not have to use the included tent poles or tie-downs. IT is or it can get hot and that is why I did not give a 5 star rating. The size could be bigger but 2 adults can fit inside OK.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Patino

customer_reviews.title: This cabana is great lightweight easy to carry and so easy to put ...
customer_reviews.text: This cabana is great lightweight easy to carry and so easy to put it up I think it took me 5 mins and I was done the only negative thing is the mat gets very hot in the sun and I had to put towels down so no one burnt their feet but over all I am very happy
customer_reviews.author: BETHANY J LAWRENCE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shelter For Day Outings
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a recent family trip to the beach. Being that we have a newborn, I was concerned about the suns potential effects on the baby. This thing worked great to keep my wife and the baby sheltered, especially while she was breast feeding our little one. Our four year old loved it too. Setting up was simple, but taking down took about 10 minutes until I figued it out. Now I have to teach the wife so she can use it when she takes the kids out without me. Great price for what it does. Will be testing this one out again on the fourth of July for a picnic under the fireworks.
customer_reviews.author: Particular Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Watch the wind
customer_reviews.text: It flew out of the sand once. We know know to use Something heavy on the corners.
customer_reviews.author: annette petriello

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent nice features but testy set up/take down
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, adaptable, great to use once set up with nice pockets inside and flaps to close the screen windows. Also has tie downs and sand bag feature to keep it stable on the beach. Plenty of room for two adults and a couple younger kids A bit hard to set up and take down by yourself, but with practice, I guess we all get used to it right? Seems to handle windy conditions real well.
customer_reviews.author: Bullwinkle

customer_reviews.title: I can't recommend this enough
customer_reviews.text: The mechanism for opening/closing this is absolute genius. It goes up in 30 seconds, and comes down in about a minute (10 seconds to collapse it, 20 more to stuff it in the bag). I can't recommend this enough. It's well-constructed, it's a great size, very portable, blah blah blah - but the mechanism for opening/closing is bananas. You'll love putting it up and taking it down, which is something I don't think I've ever said about a canopy before.
customer_reviews.author: Seppo Helava

customer_reviews.title: This was very easy to cary/instal/clean and put it back in the bag ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a baby boy and we live in San Diego - we were able to take him to the beach with 3-4 months. This was very easy to cary/instal/clean and put it back in the bag - if you have a child or want some shade while in the beach and an area to keep as sand free as possible this is a good product. It's a little big.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Easy up, Easy down!
customer_reviews.text: Easy up easy down! Keeps you cool in summer warm in winter whele you watch games or play on the beach! Bought these for our kids and us and we love them!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley S.

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: the tent is easy to open up. A little tricky to close but easy enough. My only issue is the one I received does not have that extra tarp in the front which is one of the main reasons I bought this one. Contacted the seller they said this is the only one they sold. In the process of taking a picture to show THIS is not the one I received.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: This is a great, large beach cabana
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, large beach cabana. I had originally bought it thinking I would use it to take the baby to the beach, but I'm not tall enough to pop it up by myself. I'm 5'2". I kept this one for group outings to the beach (when there will be two people to put this up), and bought the Seaside Quick Pop Up for baby & me. The Seaside I can definitely do by myself.
customer_reviews.author: JakeJen

customer_reviews.title: Everyone will think you're the s*** when you show up at the beach with this thing.
customer_reviews.text: You just roll up with your huge tote bag in the sweltering heat then -BAM! You pop this baby up and suddenly you have annoying people asking you where you got it and how much it was. Seriously though, this thing is worth every penny. Great for kids and easy to set up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa V.

customer_reviews.title: Best beach Cabana ever!
customer_reviews.text: The Lightspeed Cabana sets up in a minute and breaks down just as fast! In the hot summer months at the beach, I simply normally fold the extended floor back inside the Cabana to keep the silver plastic from heating up and burning unspecting feet. Instead I use the Camco Handy Mat. Highly recommend this Cabana,
customer_reviews.author: Solbreeze

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to Setup and Carry
customer_reviews.text: The tent is lightweight and really does go up in a matter of seconds (I was skeptical). It's a little difficult to get it back into the carrying bag after use, but it's doable. It seems to be durable as well. We bought the tent to use on the beach with an 8 month old. It staid put in the sand and was great for keeping the sun off of the baby. It is a large tent--much more than just a small shelter for a baby--so it may be too big for some beaches that don't allow tents. In my opinion, it's a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 30ish-mom-and-professional

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but must be strong
customer_reviews.text: I have just received this item and practiced putting it up in the living room. I found it very, very easy but my wife cannot put the Cabana up as the two pieces you have to push together to lock are too strong for her. Also, I did get 'bitten' a little bit so you really, really need to be careful with this Cabana as the mechanism to put the Cabana up and down are spring loaded and very powerful. If your fingers are in the wrong place you will get hurt. Looking forward to trying the Cabana on the beach now.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sean Tp Green

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cooler weather!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our baby since we were attending softball games every week last fall. It provided an awesome windbreak as well as a great play area. On especially cold evenings we could put a propane heater out front and it would maintain a comfortable environment for our little bundle of joy to play in. Summer time it does provide shaded play area - however even with the windows open for ventilation, in our hot and humid world it tended to make it a little warm.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Stone

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up/take down. Great storage.
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put up and down. Huge bonus: the storage bag is bigger than necessary! Which is great because I can never fold it up the same as when it comes in. Very useful!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Tesler

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tent. It takes less than 30 seconds to ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful tent. It takes less than 30 seconds to set up on a non-windy beach day. With the wind it's a little longer but I do agree that the tarp should be a different color or material. Our first beach trip this summer it wasn't a problem because we went in June and temps were mostly low 80s but this past week in SC temps were in upper 90's and I didn't want to put my baby on it bc it was scorching!
customer_reviews.author: Neims

customer_reviews.title: Super-easy to set up; very effective at sun and rain coverage
customer_reviews.text: We are super-happy with this purchase. We use it all the time for soccer and swim team events, tournaments and games. The windows are really nice so you can see more of the action. The ability to fold out the floor is nice, or else it can stay inside as a double floor. The two "sand bags" (to keep the cabana in place with bags of sand rather than conventional stakes) is a great idea. And it is super, super easy to set up - about like an umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: rolfdenver

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great! We took this to the Outer Banks where ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Great! We took this to the Outer Banks where we had 20-30 mph winds and it withheld everything and took no damage. Wasn't too hot inside because of the windows which are great to close when the sun comes through them. If I had a complaint which would be small would be they don't give you enough stakes for all of the stake points. You are short 2. You can stake all of the base but for windy days there are 4 stake points to hold the top down but only 2 stakes left.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: The Lightspeed Quick Cabana was perfect for my two granddaughters while we were at the ...
customer_reviews.text: The Lightspeed Quick Cabana was perfect for my two granddaughters while we were at the beach. It was stable in the beach breezes and unfolded and set up quickly. The girls loved the "windows" and having their snacks in it. Cleaning the sand out to fold and put away is another thing, but that's because of where it was used, not the cabana's problem. The storage bag is big enough that even with non-factory folding it fits back into it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up and take down. Handles the wind great and it can be done by one person
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This item was a lifesaver at the beach! My wife and 10 month old daughter were able to comfortably sit on the beach while using this cabana and my wife even felt comfortable enough to nurse our baby on the public beach. The only thing that was slightly difficult is actually popping the tent open. It takes a wee bit of muscle but is great once its open. There are pockets on the inside which are great for storing smaller items such as phones, ipods, etc. Great product. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good choice, happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Has been great for us! Like that you can open windows for a cross breeze. Very easy to open and close for packing up! Easily fits into bag for carrying!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Love this beach tent.
customer_reviews.text: Great protection at the beach. Adds so much to our beach experience. Nice looking as well as functional.
customer_reviews.author: Ojai Race Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Design, Easy to Use, Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great purchase and has been used primarily on the beach. It is light, unfolds quickly, and has enough height to allow for a collapsable chair to be set-up inside. One of my favorite features is the fact that the tent has pockets on the bottoms you can fill with sand that weight the tent down on top of the other pull down straps. The weighted sand pockets have been great for surviving windy beach conditions in Chicago. This is definitely the best sun tent I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Avoid sunburn! Get this!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't quite figure out how to put it up and take it down, initially, but once I figured it out, I could put it up in under 2 mins and take it down in the same amount of time (including bagging it back up). It's big, blocks the sun, and provides much needed shade at soccer games and at the beach. It seems well made. I've used it twice, once in some SERIOUS wind, and even though the stakes started to pull out of the sand a bit, the cabana held its own!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Hard to snap in place
customer_reviews.text: This cabana was very hard to open and snap in place for me, maybe because I did not have the arm strength. I returned it for this reason and also because I did not like the flooring material. The flooring material is the same material as a tarp. Not only is it hideous, it makes a lot of crumbling noise when you set it up and when you sit on it or move around on it.
customer_reviews.author: pink_panther

customer_reviews.title: it was easy to setup and take down and the attached sandbags ...
customer_reviews.text: Too long to fit into any suitcase (even our largest or a big duffel) so we ended up checking it both ways on a flight which ended up costing as much as the tent itself. Still, it was easy to setup and take down and the attached sandbags make it really stable even in strong trade winds of a Maui afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Jones

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beach umbrellas have nothing on this! The Lightspeed Quick Shelter really opens up and closes down in seconds... I've never seen anything like it. When I showed my wife how it works, she was absolutely stunned, as was I. As far as the functionality is concerned, this shelter will not only block light, but does an outstanding job of blocking wind (and sand in my face) and the footprint keeps the sand off your beach towel. Every aspect of this shelter has been thought out perfectly. For anyone who likes the outdoors but want's to stay out of the sun, buy this now. You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Many people at the beach has this and it does look nice. Can fit 2 people comfortable inside
customer_reviews.text: I am giving it 3 stars because of the shipping. Unfortunately, this didn't arrive on time even if I paid 1 day shipping for it. So, I returned it because I was not able to use it as planned. Many people at the beach has this and it does look nice. Can fit 2 people comfortably inside. Serves it's purpose to block direct sun and looks durable and easy to set up and break down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for shade/light weather
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this tent more than a couple times so far but it seems sturdy and well made. One person can easily open this up to use it. The covered space isn't really big enough to protect against inclement weather but it will work for a little rain and especially wind and sun. I am a little concerned about the carrying handle on the drawstring bag as it doesn't seem well attached but so far no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Sooo easy to put up and take down. Super sturdy even in the wind. Game changer!
customer_reviews.author: Linsey Betts

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Great function.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent to provide shade when we bring out infant to the beach with us and was very happy with the product. Pros: The material used provides the highest rating for protection against UV rays. The setup is quick and easy Multiple pockets to keep cell phones, sun block, etc. Sandbags offer additional weight to hold the tent down on windy days. The tent is collapsed easily and fits into the carry bag without much effort Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: JdSchnitz

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used this at a lake recently (and bought after seeing a friend's). Super easy to assemble. Easy to carry (along with the five chairs). Good protection from the sun -enough to be practical.
customer_reviews.author: JimB

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my family since we have 6 month old and used it on the beach so that we would have shade. Worked great! my husband set it up with his brother and took only 5 minutes to set up. More people can hang in it then you think as well! My little took a nap in it too! another addee bonus---had screened windowns that can be covered or not so that a breeze can pass through if their is one! We all really enjoyed this! great purchase for a family with babies and kids who need a break from the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Msnick3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dog agility set-up!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this, because I travel alone to dog agility trials. I need something light & easy to set up for shade for my two dogs. This is perfect, as I can put two fairly large crates inside and there is plenty of ventilation. It is easy to set-up and take down. I did purchase better metal tent stakes for it, as the stakes included are cheap plastic and I don't think that they would last very long. So far, I think that this is the ideal shade structure to take just about anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for enjoying the beach and sheltering from the sun. It was very easy to put and up and break down even for someone like me who is not mechanically inclined. On our first day there, it was extremely windy. The cabana could not withstand the wind but I don't think it is built for that anyway. Other than that, this cabana is perfect. The cost, ease of setup/breakdown and comfort all make this an exceptional buy.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: I read a lot of reviews before purchasing it and was hoping it would be useful to provide shelter from the sun when we are ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this all summer and I don't think I would purchase it again. I read a lot of reviews before purchasing it and was hoping it would be useful to provide shelter from the sun when we are at the beach. It really doesn't provide that much shade. Most of the time the covered area is still partially exposed to the sun. I could turn it away from the sun, but then it would be hard to keep an eye on my kids in the ocean. It is easy to put up and take down, but not very useful for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Dana N. Nassau

customer_reviews.title: It's great. I have found many a kid napping in ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for several years now and use it all during baseball season for the kids. It's great. I have found many a kid napping in it, having picnics and just trying to stay cool. It's fabulous for the price and holds up really well. I would totally buy it again if I needed another one.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Is exactly  as described..lightweight and very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item mainly because my daughter is recovering from Cancer ..she's 3 and needed a shady area to hang out while her brother went wild outside. This product is awesome,I hate fumbling around with tent poles mainly because I can't keep my eyes on kids at the same time.Now I don't have to. Product was so lightweight my 6 year old could carry it for me and popped up and took down in a jiffy and it even fit back in the bag no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beach tent
customer_reviews.text: Awesome beach tent!!! 8 month old twins, 2 adults & a ton of stuff! So light to carry, easy & quick set up/take down. Saw a lot of the other shade tents on the beach that we had considered & had no regrets with our choice! In fact seeing the others reinforced that we made the right decision!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, effective
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our infant son when we went to the beach. It worked great, easy to assemble/disassemble and was light weight. The one downside is the floor got just as hot as the sand, if not hotter.We had to cover every inch with towels. But it wasn't a big deal, I was just glad it did well providing him shade.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F.

customer_reviews.title: happy purchase for lake days
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with our purchase. Perfect for2 chairs or just to let the kids sit under. For a bigger group i would use a canopy but for me and my 2 kids it's perfect for our lake days! Very lightweight The ground tarp does get very hot. cannot walk on without a towel/blanket/shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat happy
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of opening and closing the beach tent but your suppose to be able to pull the flap up so you can change in it but I can't find anyway to connect the flap to the top. Am I missing something? This was the reason I bought this particular beach tent. I think they should have shown how to connect it in their little video.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product but material is cheap
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy to set up and use but the material is not very highly quality. The strap on the carry case ripped before I even used it and after the third use I noticed a small tear in the tent itself. Great design but needs to be made if more durable material.
customer_reviews.author: PinarelloFP5

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, big but it gets a little hot
customer_reviews.text: We really like this cabana. It can fit our whole family of 4 and it very easy to set up. It only took about 5 minutes the first time we put it up. I like all of the mesh windows but it still tends to get very hot in there. I like the idea of the front area but it ended up just getting all sandy so we will probably just tuck it under the next time we use it. The sand bags are great and it really is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: spasseync

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with this product. There are more expensive models that are probably of slightly better construction, but this one does as advertised, is extremely light to carry, and easy to set up and take down. Great for soccer games go give little ones place to play/rest/eat. Clean up is a simple as hosting it down. Of important note is the fact the bag is big enough you don't have to fight to get it back in.
customer_reviews.author: JAGMAN

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Used it on the beach this summer. Did a great job. Worth every penny. Never knew how I stayed on the beach without it. One tip, practice step up and take down....trust me. Not hard after a few times but if you don't you could have a melt down. I say again, not difficult but just practice a couple times.
customer_reviews.author: William James

customer_reviews.title: Great for Protection while Watching Sports
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it five stars if it was easier to snap the bottom portion to the top as shown in the video. Have not used it yet, but after setting up for a trial run, it looked like it was well made and perfect for sitting under to watch outdoor sports. Once opened, I wish it hadn't been so wrinkled because it does not lay completely flat as in the picture. Maybe over time the wrinkles will be less.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for the beach
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our first trip to the beach with our infant daughter. I wanted something to keep the sun off of her and give her a place to nap. The bottom tarp is very large. It was good for myself, daughter, husband, all of our things and we still had plenty of space. It is not too heavy and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amber H.

product_meta.title: Lightspeed Outdoors Quick Cabana Beach Tent Sun Shelter
feature_bullets: Easy up and down compression hub system makes this sun canopy as refreshing as a cool pacific breeze with maximum UPF 50+ sun protection
Lightweight at 6. 1 lbs. ; this sun shelter gives 96" x 54" x 48" Plus a 40" porch of space for 2 adults and children or pets; packs down to 40. 94" x 5. 51" x 5. 51" for easy carrying and storage
3 mesh windows with shades for maximum ventilation or privacy; dog and kid durable PE floor; thick 8. 5mm fiberglass for added stability; umbrella rated 450mm PU Coating for wet conditions
Easy to pack oversize carry bag, Sand pockets, 8 heavy duty plastic stakes, and guy lines are included
Customer friendly 1-year on all sun shelter and beach shade canopy tents

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
